Posts.Content:
Hi Everyone,
My name is Janice and i'm looking for people with Breast cancer and Brain Mets ONLY. I was recommended the following treatments for my brain mets and i really hope i can find someone who has experience with one of the following:
- Cellect-Budwig
- IPT therapy
- Hyberbaric oxygen
- Banerji Protocol
- Poly ICLC
- ANG1005
- Valproic acid
I'm really desperate and hope to find any information about
 any of these topics.
Please help.
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer With ONLY brain metastases - advice.
